alert.note: Alert for Quay County; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 19 at 1:11AM MDT until April 19 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands, Quay County, Union County, and Southwest Mountains. * WHEN...From Noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust over northeast New Mexico may result in occasionally reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Quay County; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains; Union County
